review: I'm a Prime member, but my TV, Tivo, and DVD player are not on the list for free Prime videos.  This device allows me to take advantage of that benefit at a very nominal cost.  It works very well, beautiful HD video and sound.  It does require an electrical outlet and an HDMI port on your TV.  So, make sure you have one of each available.
